question.body: The actual cause of hypertension due to polycythemia is __________.

multiple_choice.choice: increased RBC production by the bone marrow

response.feedback: Incorrect. High RBC production may be transient during high altitude acclimatization.
Correct. High blood viscosity does cause hypertension due to overworking of the myocardium.
Incorrect. High EPO may cause high hematocrit, but that does not necessarily lead to hypertension.
Incorrect. Low oxygen will lead to higher EPO, which may lead to increased RBC production, but hypertension is not a natural consequence of that.
